file_insights.changes_summary: Added custom transition component with Fade+Grow effects and integrated it into Dialog component

patterns_discovered.description: Created a forwardRef-wrapped functional component that combines Fade and Grow transitions with staggered timeouts (300ms Fade, 200ms Grow)
patterns_discovered.significance: Enables smooth, sophisticated modal entry animations

patterns_discovered.description: Nesting multiple MUI transition components (Fade wrapping Grow) for layered animation effects
patterns_discovered.significance: Allows complex animations through component composition rather than custom CSS

patterns_discovered.description: Using TypeScript generics and forwardRef to properly type and forward transition props to child components
patterns_discovered.significance: Maintains proper typing and ref handling in transition component chain

gotchas_discovered.description: MUI transition components require forwardRef wrapping and proper TypeScript typing to work correctly with Dialog component
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without proper ref handling, the transition component may not integrate properly with MUI's Dialog internals

gotchas_discovered.description: When nesting transitions, timeout values need coordination - inner transition timeout must be different from outer to create cascading effect
gotchas_discovered.impact: Using same timeout values can result in jarring or overlapping animations

gotchas_discovered.description: Custom transition components must accept and properly handle TransitionProps including 'in' and 'timeout' properties
gotchas_discovered.impact: Missing these props or not implementing them correctly breaks the Dialog's animation control

approach_outcome.implementation_approach: Created a custom FadeGrowTransition component that combines Fade and Grow MUI transitions with staggered timeouts, then passed it to Dialog via TransitionComponent prop
approach_outcome.effort_efficiency: Single attempt successful - clean implementation with proper TypeScript typing and React patterns
approach_outcome.code_quality: High - follows MUI conventions, proper use of forwardRef, correct TypeScript generics

recommendations.suggestion: Consider making transition timeouts configurable via ModalProps if different animation speeds are needed for different use cases
Add JSDoc comment to FadeGrowTransition explaining the staggered timeout strategy for future maintainers
Add visual regression tests or Cypress E2E tests to verify the transition animations render correctly across browsers
Monitor whether layered transitions (Fade + Grow) impact performance on lower-end devices; consider making transition complexity configurable
